block.p: MOLSON INC., Montreal, named Daniel O'Neill, executive vice president and chief operating officer for North American operations, to be president and chief executive. He succeeds James Arnett, who is leaving.

PENNZOIL-QUAKER STATE CO., Houston, appointed James Postl, president and chief operating officer, to the post of chief executive. He succeeds James Pate, who was named chairman at Pennzoil-Quaker as well as at Devon Energy Corp.

MOLSON INC., Montreal, named Daniel O'Neill, executive vice president and chief operating officer for North American operations, to be president and chief executive. He succeeds James Arnett, who is leaving.

PENNZOIL-QUAKER STATE CO., Houston, appointed James Postl, president and chief operating officer, to the post of chief executive. He succeeds James Pate, who was named chairman at Pennzoil-Quaker as well as at Devon Energy Corp.
PROCTER & GAMBLE, Cincinnati, named G. Gilbert Cloyd, who most recently worked in research and development in Asia, chief technology officer. He succeeds Gordon Brunner, who is retiring.
